entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 11:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to rain this afternoon. Snow over higher terrain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Snow over higher terrain early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Local snowfall amount 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then southwest 20 gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
